description: [Emotet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0367) has been observed dropping browser password grabber modules. (Citation: Trend Micro Emotet Jan 2019)(Citation: IBM IcedID November 2017)

external_references.description: Trend Micro. (2019, January 16). Exploring Emotet's Activities . Retrieved March 25, 2019.
Kessem, L., et al. (2017, November 13). New Banking Trojan IcedID Discovered by IBM X-Force Research. Retrieved July 14, 2020.
